game.name: Dark Eyes - Super Soldier
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A 2D sci-fi shooter featuring fast movement, tactical dodging, and a wide arsenal of futuristic weapons. Battle the alien Dark Eyes in large-scale fights and push through a story shaped by dialogue and cinematic cutscenes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 2D sci-fi shooter featuring fast movement, tactical dodging, and a wide arsenal of futuristic weapons. Battle the alien Dark Eyes in large-scale fights and push through a story shaped by dialogue and cinematic cutscenes.
